name: King of 2048
description:
World famous puzzle game is now available for your Mac
Challenge yourself in this superior game now!

• 4 different game modes (classic, survival, sprint, free mode),
• 4 unique desks,
• 8 new awesome skins,
• 5 chilling sound tracks,
• 5 amazing retro 8-bit sound tracks.
Play on & enjoy the game! Download it now!
